strings.string: Select the plug-in you want to operate.
Activate or deactivate the mode to check or edit the contents of the chest protection. Deactivate it when the operation is finished.
When you touch the prepared signage, the control panel will open. Deactivate it from the LAFUN app when you are done with the operation.
Edit protection mode has been disabled.

1. Enter "cshop" on the first line of the sign adjacent to the chests and your name on the second line. 2. When you have completed the above operation, press the just button to activate the create mode and touch the target sign. 3. After creating the shop, open the app again and disable the creation mode by clicking the button below.
When you touch the prepared signage, the control panel will open. Deactivate it from the LAFUN app when you are done with the operation.
Shop creation mode has been disabled.
This action clears the items in your inventory. The following items will be deleted. ãƒ»All items except CPhone, armors, offhand inventory.
